componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
How can I add/change my profile picture?

To change your profile picture, click on the drop down icon next to your name on the top-right of the  MyEAN page. Select MyEAN profile and you will be taken to your personal profile page where you can upload a picture by clicking on the image icon.

 

How do I change my password?

To change your password, click on the drop down icon next to your name on the top-right of the  MyEAN page. Select “My Settings” and under “Log-in details” click on change password.  You will then receive an email with a link to page where you can enter and confirm your new password.

 

How can I ensure that my mailing address is correct?

To view/change your mailing address, click on the My Contact Details tab. Scroll down to “Address information”. Here you can view your addresses which are saved in MyEAN. To edit an address simply click on the edit icon. Then use the drop-down list below to select the address to which mail should be sent to you.

 

How do I control who sees my profile information?

To change your profile visibility settings, click on the drop-down icon next to your name on the top-right of the MyEAN page. Select “My Settings” and under MyEAN Notifications you can disable/enable email notifications, as well as notifications for specific actions within MyEAN.

 

How can I turn off email notifications?

To change email notifications settings, click on the drop-down icon next to your name on the top-right of the MyEAN page. Select “My Settings” and under MyEAN Notifications you can disable/enable email notifications as well as notifications for specific actions within MyEAN.

 

How can I join/leave a group?

To join a group, go to the page of the group you would like to join and click on Join or in the case of a private group, click on Ask to Join. For public groups you can join immediately, for private groups your request to join must be approved by a moderator before you can become a member of the group.

 

How can I create a group?

Creating Groups in MyEAN is possible for EAN Full, Corresponding, RRFS or FEAN members. To create a group, click on the MyEAN groups tab. From there you can click on the Create Group button to begin. You will need to enter a name for the group, and you can also enter a description and information. In the next step you can add a profile picture for your group. In the next step, you can search the MyEAN community and invite others to join the group. Invited users must accept the invitation to join the group in order to become part of the group.

 

How can I change notifications about set MyEAN group updates?

To change the frequency of email notifications related to a group, first navigate to the specific group under the My Groups tab. Once on the group page you can set the frequency of notifications by opening the drop-down menu next to the email icon to the right of the group profile picture. There you have the following options:

·        Every Post – you recieve an email notification for every post made within the group

·        Daily Digest – You will receive an email summary of the group’s activity each day

·        Weekly Digest – You will receive an email summary of the group’s activity each week

·        Limited – You will not receive emails related to posts or activity within the group. You may however receive emails related to important announcements made within groups administered by EAN Headoffice.

 

 

What is the difference between Post, Poll and Question?

 

Post

In MyEAN, users can post updates within a group. A post is simply an announcement, i.e. some information you would like to share with the group’s members. To make a post type your message in the field under the Post tab. You can also mention other MyEAN users by typing @ followed by their name and you can upload files too.

 

Poll

In MyEAN, you can create a poll within a group to conduct a quick survey on a topic. To create a poll within a group, simply click on the poll tab above the Group’s feed. Enter a question in the text box. In the question, you can add a hashtag or mention someone. Provide at least two choices (and up to a maximum of ten). To add another choice, click Add more choices. To post the poll, click Share.

 

Question

In MyEAN, users can ask questions within group. Click the Question tab in the field for posting. There you can ask the question (with a character limit of 255) and enter some details and attachments. After a question is asked, group moderators and the person who asked the question can select a best answer. The best answer is prominently displayed in the feed, allowing other users to quickly and easily find the information they need.
